scripts.redis-check: node -e "import('dotenv/config'); import redis from 'redis'; async function check() { const client = redis.createClient({ url: `redis://${process.env.REDIS_HOST}:${process.env.REDIS_PORT}` }); try { await client.connect(); console.log('✅ Redis connected'); process.exit(0); } catch (err) { console.log('❌ Redis connection failed:', err); process.exit(1); } } check();"
